title: How to wash a dead body that is decomposed or badly burned? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Afiya says how to wash a body of disease which has been partly decomposed and it cannot be washed normally as the skin of the deceased will peel off what should one do in this situation the answer is when a person is partially decomposed or badly burnt or water would harm his body when washing the scholars say you wash whatever is washable without any harm and the rest or the whole thing if needed is only performed you perform tayammum so performed 2mm for the deceased that you cannot wash and that would be sufficient insha'Allah kallu says
